prompt: I have an 'Affidavit' to prove my work experience for a China Z-Visa. Is this sufficient? / 我有一份宣誓书证明工作经验。申请中国工签够了吗？
Explain the 144-hour visa-free transit policy for foreigners entering Shanghai. / 解释外国人进入上海的144小时过境免签政策。
I lost my passport in China. What are the immediate steps to avoid illegal stay? / 我在中国丢失了护照。为避免非法居留，紧急步骤是什么？
How to prove my 2-year work experience for a Category B Work Permit? / 如何证明申请B类工签所需的2年工作经验？
The landlord offers a discount if I skip the Police Registration (住宿登记). Is it safe? / 房东说不办住宿登记可以减房租，安全吗？
In my country, we have 'Tenant's Rights' to stay after the lease expires. Does China have similar protection? / 在我国家租赁到期后有留居权。中国有类似保护吗？
I paid the deposit via WeChat but have no paper receipt. Is the WeChat record enough to sue? / 我通过微信付了押金但没收据。微信记录足以起诉吗？
Can a foreigner sub-let (转租) an apartment in China legally? / 外国人在中国合法转租公寓需要什么条件？
My contract expired but I am still working. My boss won't renew but continues to pay. Rights? / 合同到期我在工作，老板不续签但发工资。我有什么权利？
What is the difference between 'Labor Contract' and 'Service Agreement' (劳务合同) for expats? / 外国人的‘劳动合同’与‘劳务合同’有什么区别？
My employer owes me 3 months salary. What evidence should I collect first? / 公司欠薪3个月，我应该首先收集什么证据？
Can a foreigner work for two companies simultaneously in China? / 外国人可以在中国同时为两家公司工作吗？
I have a 'Prenuptial Agreement' from London. Is it enforceable in a Chinese court? / 我有一份伦敦的婚前协议。中国法院认可吗？
What are the legal risks of 'Fake Marriage' for obtaining a Green Card in China? / 为了中国绿卡‘假结婚’的法律风险是什么？
How to legally prove a 'Common Law Marriage' (Facto Marriage) in China? / 在中国如何合法证明‘事实婚姻’？
What is the 'Cooling-off Period' (离婚冷静期) for foreigners divorcing in China? / 外国人在中国离婚的‘冷静期’规定是什么？
Explain the 183-day rule for Individual Income Tax (IIT) for foreigners. / 解释外国人个税的183天规则。
Is it legal to receive part of the salary in my offshore account without declaring tax in China? / 一部分工资发到境外账户且不报税合法吗？
How can I obtain my official Tax Record for permanent residence application? / 申请永居如何获取官方个税完税证明？
Can I claim 'Tax Credits' for taxes paid in my home country? / 我在中国可以抵免在母国已缴纳的税款吗？
